price: Dan sesungguhnya mereka sebelum itu telah berjanji kepada Allah, "Mereka tidak akan berbalik ke belakang (mundur)".  Dan adalah perjanjian dengan Allah akan diminta pertanggunganjawabnya.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ كَانُواْ عَٰهَدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مِن قَبۡلُ لَا يُوَلُّونَ ٱلۡأَدۡبَٰرَۚ وَكَانَ عَهۡدُ ٱللَّهِ مَسۡـُٔولٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad kānū ʿāhadū al-laha min qablu lā yuwallūna al-adbāra wakāna ʿahdu al-lahi masūlan
